title: Dragon Ball Gaiden: That Time I Got Reincarnated As Yamcha!
alternative_title: Dragon Ball Gaiden: Tensei-shitara Yamcha Datta Ken ; Dragon Ball Side Story - Reborn as Yamcha ; O Caso de Ser Reencarnado como Yamcha ; ドラゴンボール外伝　転生したらヤムチャだった件 ; DRAGON BALL外伝 転生したらヤムチャだった件
status: Dragon Ball Gaiden: Tensei-shitara Yamcha Datta Ken ; Dragon Ball Side Story - Reborn as Yamcha ; O Caso de Ser Reencarnado como Yamcha ; ドラゴンボール外伝　転生したらヤムチャだった件 ; DRAGON BALL外伝 転生したらヤムチャだった件
description:
Description :
        A Japanese high school student is on his way to a Dragon Ball event with a friend. Suddenly, he sees a cute girl wearing a short skirt, but when he runs over to get a closer look, he trips and dies. Upon waking up, he realizes he's turned into Yamcha from Dragon Ball. Being an avid fan of the series, he knows what lies ahead in Yamcha's future, thus he decides to take matters into his own hands, in order to change Yamcha's fate.
